spirit:component.spirit:name: xilinx_phy10g

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: core_gt_drp_interface
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: DRP Interface from Core to Transceiver - connect directly to user_gt_drp_interface if no user interaction required

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: user_gt_drp_interface
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: DRP Interface to Transceiver - add arbiter if user interaction required

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: core_to_gt_drp
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: DRP Interface from Core to Transceiver - connect directly to gt_drp interface if no user interaction required

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: gt_drp
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: DRP Interface to Transceiver - add arbiter if user interaction required

spirit:enumeration.spirit:text: Include Shared Logic in example design

spirit:component.spirit:description: The Xilinx Ten Gigabit Ethernet PCS/PMA (10GBASE-R/KR) core is designed to the IEEE specification 802.3 2008. An example design is provided to accelerate your design cycle.
